attributes.action: HAVE 3RD YEAR NURSING STUDENTS FINAL YEAR PAID OFF.
attributes.additional_details: 3rd year nursing students are being called in to help on the front line during this crisis. These students are risking their own safety and are not being paid a penny. They deserve to have their final years education paid for by the Government.  Please give these students the recognition they deserve for the help they are proving us at this time.
attributes.background: The Government should refund 3rd year nursing students of this academic year and pay it off. These students are putting others safety before their own.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302844

(An earlier response contained a link to an incorrect petition. Apologies for any confusion caused)
